targets.queryText: SELECT period_start_date || ' -> ' || period_end_date AS value FROM snapshots WHERE period_type='QUARTER' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT period_start_date || ' -> ' || period_end_date AS value FROM snapshots WHERE period_type='QUARTER' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: WITH s AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshots WHERE period_type='QUARTER' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1), idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, j FROM s) SELECT CAST(COALESCE(json_extract(j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', i)), json_extract(j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.market_value', i))) AS REAL) AS value FROM idx;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH s AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshots WHERE period_type='QUARTER' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1), idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, j FROM s) SELECT CAST(COALESCE(json_extract(j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.total_market_value', i)), json_extract(j, printf('$.intervals[%d].totals.market_value', i))) AS REAL) AS value FROM idx;

targets.queryText: WITH s AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshots WHERE period_type='QUARTER' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1), idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, j FROM s) SELECT CAST(json_extract(j, printf('$.intervals[%d].income.projected_monthly_income', i)) AS REAL) AS value FROM idx;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH s AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshots WHERE period_type='QUARTER' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1), idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, j FROM s) SELECT CAST(json_extract(j, printf('$.intervals[%d].income.projected_monthly_income', i)) AS REAL) AS value FROM idx;

targets.queryText: WITH s AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshots WHERE period_type='QUARTER' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1), idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, j FROM s) SELECT CAST(json_extract(j, printf('$.intervals[%d].margin.ltv_pct', i)) AS REAL) AS value FROM idx;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH s AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshots WHERE period_type='QUARTER' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1), idx AS (SELECT (json_array_length(j,'$.intervals')-1) AS i, j FROM s) SELECT CAST(json_extract(j, printf('$.intervals[%d].margin.ltv_pct', i)) AS REAL) AS value FROM idx;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshots WHERE period_type='QUARTER' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1), added AS (SELECT 'Added' AS type, json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.weight_end_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct, NULL AS pnl_dollar FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.portfolio_changes.holdings_added') h LIMIT 3), removed AS (SELECT 'Removed' AS type, json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.weight_start_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct, NULL AS pnl_dollar FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.portfolio_changes.holdings_removed') h LIMIT 3), gainers AS (SELECT 'Gainer' AS type, json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, NULL AS weight_pct, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.pnl_dollar_period') AS REAL) AS pnl_dollar FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.portfolio_changes.top_gainers') h LIMIT 3), losers AS (SELECT 'Loser' AS type, json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, NULL AS weight_pct, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.pnl_dollar_period') AS REAL) AS pnl_dollar FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.portfolio_changes.top_losers') h LIMIT 3) SELECT * FROM added UNION ALL SELECT * FROM removed UNION ALL SELECT * FROM gainers UNION ALL SELECT * FROM losers;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshots WHERE period_type='QUARTER' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1), added AS (SELECT 'Added' AS type, json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.weight_end_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct, NULL AS pnl_dollar FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.portfolio_changes.holdings_added') h LIMIT 3), removed AS (SELECT 'Removed' AS type, json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.weight_start_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct, NULL AS pnl_dollar FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.portfolio_changes.holdings_removed') h LIMIT 3), gainers AS (SELECT 'Gainer' AS type, json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, NULL AS weight_pct, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.pnl_dollar_period') AS REAL) AS pnl_dollar FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.portfolio_changes.top_gainers') h LIMIT 3), losers AS (SELECT 'Loser' AS type, json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, NULL AS weight_pct, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.pnl_dollar_period') AS REAL) AS pnl_dollar FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.portfolio_changes.top_losers') h LIMIT 3) SELECT * FROM added UNION ALL SELECT * FROM removed UNION ALL SELECT * FROM gainers UNION ALL SELECT * FROM losers;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json AS j FROM snapshots WHERE period_type='YEAR' ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1), added AS (SELECT 'Added' AS type, json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.weight_end_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct, NULL AS pnl_dollar FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.portfolio_changes.holdings_added') h LIMIT 3), removed AS (SELECT 'Removed' AS type, json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.weight_start_pct') AS REAL) AS weight_pct, NULL AS pnl_dollar FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.portfolio_changes.holdings_removed') h LIMIT 3), gainers AS (SELECT 'Gainer' AS type, json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, NULL AS weight_pct, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.pnl_dollar_period') AS REAL) AS pnl_dollar FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.portfolio_changes.top_gainers') h LIMIT 3), losers AS (SELECT 'Loser' AS type, json_extract(h.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, NULL AS weight_pct, CAST(json_extract(h.value,'$.pnl_dollar_period') AS REAL) AS pnl_dollar FROM latest, json_each(latest.j,'$.portfolio_changes.top_losers') h LIMIT 3) SELECT * FROM added UNION ALL SELECT * FROM removed UNION ALL SELECT * FROM gainers UNION ALL SELECT * FROM losers;
